definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
uncle/father's younger brother/husband's younger brother/Taiwan pr. [shu2]

Jiaojiang district of Taizhou city 台州市[Tai1 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang

(bird species of China) Swinhoe's minivet (Pericrocotus cantonensis)
same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]

sentences.english: White bean cannelloni salad with red, green, and yellow peppers with tomato concasse.
sentences.chinese: 白豆碎肉沙拉伴紅椒，綠椒和黃椒，番茄碎。

sentences.english: This plant flowers with a distinct yellow limb of the spathe.
sentences.chinese: 這些椒開花時佛焰苞的冠檐是鮮明的黃色。

sentences.english: He likes the dishes spiced with much pepper.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡喫加飾多糊椒粉的萊。

sentences.english: This guy must have had it with ghost peppers and heated until it was boiling or something.
sentences.chinese: 這傢伙肯定是放了斷魂椒或者加熱直到它沸騰之類的。

sentences.english: Cover a small pull with each pull of the, so called mother and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 蓋每拉有小拉附之，故稱母子椒。

sentences.english: Chop the head of pepper, you resist the temptation to live?
sentences.chinese: 剁椒魚頭的誘惑，你抵擋的住嗎？

sentences.english: They are often used interchangeably with jalapeños.
sentences.chinese: 在烹飪中往往與墨西哥椒互換使用。

sentences.english: Then place shredded pepper for quick-frying for a short while. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 再把椒絲放進去快炒幾下即可。

sentences.english: This chilli needs a little more spice!
sentences.chinese: 這個紅番椒需要多點調味。

sentences.english: Monday's special is fish head with chopped pepper.
sentences.chinese: 星期一的特色菜是剁椒魚頭。

definition: same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]
same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]
five spice seasoned/incorporating the five basic flavors of Chinese cooking (sweet, sour, bitter, savory, salty)
to stew in soy sauce and spices
